electronics.name: Samsung QN90A Neo QLED
electronics.description: The Samsung QN90A Neo QLED is a high-end television set with a 4K resolution and HDR support. It features a 65-inch screen, Quantum HDR 32X, and Quantum Processor 4K with AI Upscaling.

electronics.description: The LG C1 OLED is a premium television set with a 4K resolution and HDR support. It features a 55-inch screen, Dolby Vision IQ, and α9 Gen4 AI Processor 4K.

electronics.name: Sony A8H OLED
electronics.description: The Sony A8H OLED is a high-end television set with a 4K resolution and HDR support. It features a 65-inch screen, Acoustic Surface Audio, and X1 Ultimate Processor.

electronics.name: TCL 6-Series R635
electronics.description: The TCL 6-Series R635 is a mid-range television set with a 4K resolution and HDR support. It features a 55-inch screen, QLED technology, and Contrast Control Zone technology.

electronics.name: Vizio M-Series Quantum
electronics.description: The Vizio M-Series Quantum is a mid-range television set with a 4K resolution and HDR support. It features a 65-inch screen, Quantum Color technology, and IQ Active Processor.

electronics.name: Hisense H9G Quantum
electronics.description: The Hisense H9G Quantum is a mid-range television set with a 4K resolution and HDR support. It features a 55-inch screen, Quantum Dot technology, and Dolby Atmos.

electronics.name: Samsung TU8000
electronics.description: The Samsung TU8000 is an entry-level television set with a 4K resolution and HDR support. It features a 50-inch screen, Crystal Processor 4K, and PurColor technology.

electronics.name: LG NanoCell 90 Series
electronics.description: The LG NanoCell 90 Series is a high-end television set with a 4K resolution and HDR support. It features a 65-inch screen, Nano Color Pro technology, and α7 Gen4 AI Processor 4K.

electronics.name: Sony X90J
electronics.description: The Sony X90J is a mid-range television set with a 4K resolution and HDR support. It features a 55-inch screen, Full Array LED, and X1 4K HDR Processor.

electronics.name: TCL 4-Series S435
electronics.description: The TCL 4-Series S435 is an entry-level television set with a 4K resolution and HDR support. It features a 43-inch screen, Direct-lit LED, and 120Hz Clear Motion Index.

electronics.name: Vizio V-Series V505-H19
electronics.description: The Vizio V-Series V505-H19 is an entry-level television set with a 4K resolution and HDR support. It features a 50-inch screen, Full-Array LED backlight, and V-Gaming Engine.

electronics.name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
electronics.description: The Bose QuietComfort 35 II is a premium noise-cancelling wireless headset. It features Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa integration, up to 20 hours of battery life, and high-quality audio performance.

electronics.name: Sony WH-1000XM4
electronics.description: The Sony WH-1000XM4 is a premium noise-cancelling wireless headset. It features Adaptive Sound Control, up to 30 hours of battery life, and high-resolution audio performance.

electronics.name: Jabra Elite 85t
electronics.description: The Jabra Elite 85t is a high-end true wireless earbud set with active noise-cancellation. It features up to 5.5 hours of battery life, a wireless charging case, and customizable touch controls.

electronics.name: Apple AirPods Pro
electronics.description: The Apple AirPods Pro is a premium true wireless earbud set with active noise-cancellation. It features up to 4.5 hours of battery life, a wireless charging case, and hands-free Siri access.

electronics.name: Sennheiser Momentum True Wireless 2
electronics.description: The Sennheiser Momentum True Wireless 2 is a high-end true wireless earbud set with active noise-cancellation. It features up to 7 hours of battery life, a wireless charging case, and high-fidelity audio performance.

electronics.name: Bose Sport Earbuds
electronics.description: The Bose Sport Earbuds is a true wireless earbud set designed for sports and fitness enthusiasts. It features up to 5 hours of battery life, IPX4 water resistance, and StayHear Max eartips for a secure and comfortable fit.

electronics.name: Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro
electronics.description: The Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro is a premium true wireless earbud set with active noise-cancellation. It features up to 5 hours of battery life, a wireless charging case, and customizable touch controls.

electronics.name: Beats Solo3 Wireless
electronics.description: The Beats Solo3 Wireless is a premium on-ear wireless headset. It features up to 40 hours of battery life, fast charging, and adjustable fit for all-day comfort.

electronics.name: Dell XPS 13
electronics.description: The Dell XPS 13 is a high-end laptop with a sleek design and powerful performance. It features a 13.3-inch FHD display, 11th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and 512GB SSD storage.

electronics.name: Apple MacBook Pro 13
electronics.description: The Apple MacBook Pro 13 is a high-end laptop with a stunning Retina display and fast performance. It features a 13.3-inch Retina display, M1 chip with 8-core CPU and 8-core GPU, 8GB of RAM, and 256GB SSD storage.

electronics.name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
electronics.description: The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon is a premium business laptop with a durable design and powerful performance. It features a 14-inch FHD display, 11th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and 512GB SSD storage.

electronics.name: HP Spectre x360
electronics.description: The HP Spectre x360 is a premium 2-in-1 laptop with a stylish design and versatile functionality. It features a 13.3-inch FHD touchscreen display, 11th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and 1TB SSD storage.

electronics.name: Asus ZenBook Duo
electronics.description: The Asus ZenBook Duo is a unique laptop with a dual-screen design and powerful performance. It features a 14-inch FHD main display, 10th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and 1TB SSD storage.

electronics.name: Acer Predator Helios 300
electronics.description: The Acer Predator Helios 300 is a high-performance gaming laptop with a sleek design and powerful specs. It features a 15.6-inch FHD IPS display, 10th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and 512GB SSD storage. It also has an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 graphics card for excellent gaming performance.

electronics.name: Dell Inspiron 15
electronics.description: The Dell Inspiron 15 is a mid-range laptop with a sleek design and solid performance. It features a 15.6-inch FHD display, 11th Gen Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB of RAM, and 256GB SSD storage.

electronics.name: HP Pavilion x360
electronics.description: The HP Pavilion x360 is a versatile 2-in-1 laptop with a stylish design and solid performance. It features a 14-inch FHD touchscreen display, 11th Gen Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB of RAM, and 512GB SSD storage.

electronics.name: Canon PIXMA TR150
electronics.description: The Canon PIXMA TR150 is a compact wireless printer that's perfect for on-the-go printing. It features a 1.44-inch OLED display, built-in WiFi, and compatibility with various mobile printing apps.

electronics.name: HP OfficeJet Pro 9015e
electronics.description: The HP OfficeJet Pro 9015e is an all-in-one printer that's perfect for small offices. It features automatic two-sided printing, a 2.65-inch color touchscreen, and smart security features.

electronics.name: Epson EcoTank ET-2720
electronics.description: The Epson EcoTank ET-2720 is a wireless all-in-one printer that comes with up to two years worth of ink in the box. It features easy-to-use wireless printing, a 1.44-inch color display, and borderless printing up to 8.5 x 11 inches.

electronics.name: Brother MFC-L2750DW XL
electronics.description: The Brother MFC-L2750DW XL is a monochrome laser all-in-one printer that's perfect for home or small office use. It features fast print speeds, automatic two-sided printing, and a 2.7-inch color touchscreen.

electronics.name: HP LaserJet Pro M404dn
electronics.description: The HP LaserJet Pro M404dn is a monochrome laser printer that's perfect for small to medium-sized businesses. It features fast print speeds, automatic two-sided printing, and enhanced security features.

electronics.name: Canon imageFORMULA R40
electronics.description: The Canon imageFORMULA R40 is a desktop document scanner that's perfect for small businesses or home offices. It features fast scanning speeds, automatic feeding of up to 60 sheets, and compatibility with various software programs.

electronics.name: Epson Perfection V600
electronics.description: The Epson Perfection V600 is a high-quality scanner that's perfect for scanning photos, documents, and even 35mm slides and film. It features high resolution scanning up to 6400 dpi, advanced digital dust correction, and easy-to-use software.

electronics.name: Brother DS-940DW
electronics.description: The Brother DS-940DW is a portable wireless document scanner that's perfect for on-the-go scanning. It features automatic feeding of up to 20 sheets, compatibility with various mobile scanning apps, and up to 11 pages per minute scanning speed.

electronics.name: PlayStation 5
electronics.description: The PlayStation 5 is Sony's latest gaming console, featuring a powerful custom AMD Zen 2 processor and Radeon RDNA 2 graphics, as well as an SSD for lightning-fast loading times. It also supports 4K gaming and ray tracing.

electronics.name: Xbox Series X
electronics.description: The Xbox Series X is Microsoft's latest gaming console, featuring a custom AMD Zen 2 processor and Radeon RDNA 2 graphics, as well as an SSD for lightning-fast loading times. It also supports 4K gaming and ray tracing.

electronics.name: Nintendo Switch
electronics.description: The Nintendo Switch is a hybrid console that can be used both as a home console and as a portable device. It features a 6.2-inch touchscreen, detachable Joy-Con controllers, and a dock for connecting to a TV.

electronics.name: PlayStation 4 Pro
electronics.description: The PlayStation 4 Pro is a high-end version of Sony's previous gaming console, featuring upgraded hardware that supports 4K gaming and HDR. It also has a larger hard drive than the standard PlayStation 4.

electronics.name: Xbox One X
electronics.description: The Xbox One X is a high-end version of Microsoft's previous gaming console, featuring upgraded hardware that supports 4K gaming and HDR. It also has a larger hard drive than the standard Xbox One.

electronics.name: Nintendo Switch Lite
electronics.description: The Nintendo Switch Lite is a smaller, more portable version of the Nintendo Switch that can only be used as a handheld device. It features a 5.5-inch touchscreen and integrated controls.

electronics.name: PlayStation 3
electronics.description: The PlayStation 3 is Sony's previous gaming console, released in 2006. It features a custom IBM Cell processor, a Blu-ray drive, and support for online gaming through PlayStation Network. It also has backwards compatibility with many PlayStation 2 games.

electronics.name: Xbox 360
electronics.description: The Xbox 360 is Microsoft's previous gaming console, released in 2005. It features a custom IBM PowerPC processor, a DVD drive, and support for online gaming through Xbox Live. It also has backwards compatibility with many original Xbox games.

electronics.name: Microsoft Office 365 Personal
electronics.description: Microsoft Office 365 is a subscription-based suite of productivity software that includes Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and more. The Personal edition is designed for individuals and includes access to all Office apps, as well as 1TB of OneDrive cloud storage.

electronics.name: Adobe Photoshop CC
electronics.description: Adobe Photoshop CC is a powerful image editing software used by photographers, designers, and artists. It includes advanced tools for editing, compositing, and retouching photos, as well as support for 3D graphics and video editing.

electronics.name: AutoCAD LT 2022
electronics.description: AutoCAD LT is a popular 2D drafting and design software used by architects, engineers, and construction professionals. It includes tools for creating and editing technical drawings, as well as support for industry-standard file formats.

electronics.name: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
electronics.description: Windows 10 Pro is the professional edition of Microsoft's popular operating system. It includes advanced security features, remote desktop support, and the ability to join a domain. It is designed for business and power users.

electronics.name: Adobe Premiere Pro CC
electronics.description: Adobe Premiere Pro CC is a professional video editing software used by filmmakers, TV editors, and videographers. It includes advanced tools for color correction, audio editing, and video effects, as well as support for a wide range of video formats.

electronics.name: Microsoft Visio Professional 2021
electronics.description: Microsoft Visio is a powerful diagramming and flowcharting software used by business professionals and IT experts. The Professional edition includes advanced features for creating complex diagrams and processes, as well as support for data connectivity and automation.

electronics.name: VMware Workstation Pro 16
electronics.description: VMware Workstation Pro is a powerful virtualization software used by IT professionals and developers. It allows users to run multiple operating systems on a single computer, as well as create and test virtual machines in a secure and isolated environment.

electronics.name: CorelDRAW Graphics Suite 2021
electronics.description: CorelDRAW Graphics Suite is a popular graphic design software used by artists, designers, and illustrators. The 2021 edition includes new features and enhancements, as well as support for a wide range of file formats and platforms.
